page.title: 09LEISURE IN BUCKLAND BREWER
page.content:
IN A SURVEY OF ABOUT TWO HUNDRED RESIDENTS OF THE AREA IT WAS FOUND THAT AT LEAST SIXTY-FIVE DISTINCT {LEISURE ACTIVITIES}WERE ENJOYED BY ONE OR MORE PEOPLE.
THE SINGLE MOST POPULAR ACTIVITY WAS{GARDENING,}WHICH WAS MENTIONED BY THIRTY-FIVE PERCENT OF THOSE QUESTIONED. FOURTEEN PERCENT LISTED {WATCHING SPORT, TELEVISION}OR{KNITTING AS A LEISURE TIME ACTIVITY. THESE WERE FOLLOWED IN ORDER BY{READING, MENTIONED BY ELEVEN PERCENT,PLAYING {SKITTLES}(EIGHT PERCENT),{WALKING, {CRICKET}AND{SEWING}(SIX PERCENT) AND {SQUASH,MUSIC}AND{SWIMMING}(EACH FIVE PERCENT).
